B2FFE075B9F9952FA6F564A278C0E5B9FCE16CDB.query: CREATE TABLE "users" ('id' INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'name' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('name') <= 255), 'email' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('email') <= 255), 'password' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('password') <= 255));

7B14C72A8AECE32E891504898B16A67C19066FAA.query: CREATE TABLE "status" ('id' INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'name' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('name') <= 255));

E335C22CB0EA4D5783DF71BD24B78C8A9797F4B9.query: CREATE TABLE "todo" ('id' INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'title' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('title') <= 255), 'content_md' TEXT NOT NULL, 'content_html' TEXT NOT NULL, 'created_by' INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY('created_by') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL);

5A7382DBA492462422C7B0E0723BB8DE6E9FF4FD.query: CREATE TABLE "todo" ('id' INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'title' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('title') <= 255), 'content_md' TEXT NOT NULL, 'content_html' TEXT NOT NULL, 'created_by' INTEGER, 'assign_to' INTEGER, 'start_on' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'deadline' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, FOREIGN KEY('created_by') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('assign_to') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL);

0C68F57C333EBE7876D20DDCDF314A89DBD977F1.query: CREATE TABLE "todo" ('id' INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, 'title' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('title') <= 255), 'content_md' TEXT NOT NULL, 'content_html' TEXT NOT NULL, 'created_by' INTEGER, 'assign_to' INTEGER, 'start_on' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'deadline' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'status_id' INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY('created_by') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('assign_to') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('status_id') REFERENCES status(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT);

11F2EF0FAB9421C985110C6814919DDEB9226627.query: CREATE TABLE "users" ('id' VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK (length('id') <= 255), 'name' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('name') <= 255), 'email' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('email') <= 255), 'password' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('password') <= 255)); CREATE INDEX users_id_index ON users(id)

08B3E715B8DCC64DBB8E2DFAB9E1E456C090908E.query: CREATE TABLE "groups" ('id' VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK (length('id') <= 255), 'name' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('name') <= 255), 'admin_id' VARCHAR UNIQUE, FOREIGN KEY('admin_id') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL); CREATE INDEX groups_id_index ON groups(id); CREATE INDEX groups_admin_id_index ON groups(admin_id)

2981B2837521A351CE092C01AF3CAA893FE72CD2.query: CREATE TABLE "todo" ('id' VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK (length('id') <= 255), 'title' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('title') <= 255), 'content_md' TEXT NOT NULL, 'content_html' TEXT NOT NULL, 'created_by' INTEGER, 'assign_to' INTEGER, 'start_on' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'deadline' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'status_id' VARCHAR UNIQUE, FOREIGN KEY('created_by') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('assign_to') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('status_id') REFERENCES status(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT); CREATE INDEX todo_id_index ON todo(id); CREATE INDEX todo_created_by_index ON todo(created_by); CREATE INDEX todo_assign_to_index ON todo(assign_to); CREATE INDEX todo_status_id_index ON todo(status_id)

7E91A9858DC7314E2898F5445CDDF12B4028CA84.query: CREATE TABLE "groups" ('id' VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK (length('id') <= 255), 'name' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('name') <= 255)); CREATE INDEX groups_id_index ON groups(id)

AC9A1B4E038427A992B96001456B574E3E156982.query: CREATE TABLE "group_user_map" ('user_id' VARCHAR UNIQUE, 'group_id' VARCHAR UNIQUE, 'is_admin' TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT false, FOREIGN KEY('user_id') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('group_id') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL); CREATE INDEX group_user_map_user_id_index ON group_user_map(user_id); CREATE INDEX group_user_map_group_id_index ON group_user_map(group_id)

33D155B5B58600AE6B0D76252B806917237893C2.query: CREATE TABLE "group_user_map" ('user_id' VARCHAR, 'group_id' VARCHAR, 'is_admin' TINYINT NOT NULL DEFAULT false, FOREIGN KEY('user_id') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('group_id') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL); CREATE INDEX group_user_map_user_id_index ON group_user_map(user_id); CREATE INDEX group_user_map_group_id_index ON group_user_map(group_id)

C5AB3A0D084C1724BB0D9F4371F0991CDEAF718D.query: CREATE TABLE "todo" ('id' VARCHAR UNIQUE NOT NULL CHECK (length('id') <= 255), 'title' VARCHAR NOT NULL CHECK (length('title') <= 255), 'content_md' TEXT NOT NULL, 'content_html' TEXT NOT NULL, 'created_by' INTEGER, 'assign_to' INTEGER, 'start_on' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'deadline' DATETIME NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'status_id' VARCHAR, FOREIGN KEY('created_by') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('assign_to') REFERENCES users(id) ON DELETE SET NULL, FOREIGN KEY('status_id') REFERENCES status(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT); CREATE INDEX todo_id_index ON todo(id); CREATE INDEX todo_created_by_index ON todo(created_by); CREATE INDEX todo_assign_to_index ON todo(assign_to); CREATE INDEX todo_status_id_index ON todo(status_id)
